paper.title: Research on the correlation of earnings quality and risk of Chinese listed company
paper.abstract: The influence of risk of listed company on earnings equality is a new area of the accounting research. In this paper, the financial risk and business risk were evaluated by leverage factor, and a new index-coefficient of fluctuation(CF) was designed to assess the earnings equality, then, the correlation between risk and earnings equality was researched through establishing multiple linear regression model. The result showed there is a good correlation between earnings equality and DOL, DFL. For the selected sample are from A share market of Shanghai and Shenzhen stock market, the fruit of the research will be beneficial to risk control and earnings equality improvement in Chinese listed company.

domain_result.justification: 该论文研究了上市公司财务风险和经营风险对盈余质量的影响，并建立了多元线性回归模型来评估两者之间的相关性。研究结果有助于中国上市公司的风险控制和盈余质量提升，这属于金融风险管理的范畴。
